ganja kilogram 40yi miligram 700k samanga pudgalayin haya deneku kalaniya kottasa aparadha wimarshana departhamenthuwa wisin athadanguwata gena thibenawa.ee ganja laga thabagena sitiyadi athadanguwata gath sakakaruwekugen helikaragath thorathuru matha, ada(26) dahawal sidukala watalimakadiyi.elesa athadanguwata gena aththe wayasa awurudu 26 th 47th athara wiye pasuwana waththala ha kalaniya yana pradeshawala padinchikaruwan pirisak.sakakaruwan santhakaye thibi wiwidha pramanaye ganja parsal saha prawahanaya sandaha yodagath jip rathayak ha thriroda rathayak kalaniya polisiya barayata gena thibenawa.athadanguwata gath sakakaruwan hayadena heta(27) adhikaranayata idiripath kirimata niyamitha bawa sandahan.siddhiya samndhayen kalaniya kottasa aparadha wimarshana departhamenthuwa wisin wadidura wimarshana kriyathmakayi.
